item.title: Re: Crank
item.content:encoded: As stated, when originally release, crank replaced the +1 d/s each season incurred, and was used to get various things that had been Season based. Baw ensued and was made only to increase ryo directly and xp/ap indirectly (from increase of success needed). It once again has a function, as stated in the new AA mission, you need 1+ crank to get Errant bits which are required to start r00t for non kagekaiju players (they need it for something else).

item.title: Re: Crank
item.content:encoded: When the crank was introduced it was meant to unlock new content. There was lots of complaining so it was changed. Future content may or may not be crank based.

item.title: Re: Crank
item.content:encoded: As of now, crank effects no game content other then higher difficulty in missions. Nothing is unlocked by upping your crank level.

item.title: Crank
item.content:encoded:
